page.title: 12EMMA'S DAY IN HAXEY
page.content: my foot angrily and squashed an ant."Breakfast time!"yelled Bruce.I tried to jump the heather,missed and fell in the garden."I'm telling!"crowed Bruce."Tell-tale tit!"I began."That's enough Emma!"mum growled. For breakfast,I had a glass of Um Bongo juice,chocolate flavoured porridge,(loads of syrup on too!)a cracker with chocolate spread on it,and a cup of tea."I don't want your Freedom!"the radio blared."Wham!Ace!"I cried.I danced around the kitchen in time to the music and fell over Bruce who was sunbathing on the floor,well it looked like that anyway. Later on,I decided to write to Victoria my friend."What's the date,mum?"I asked."The eleventh",she replied."Thanks".(I can never be bothered to look at the calendar.)
